## Laptop "breakthrough": 

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
::: {.Smaller}

1. Download & "run" [`*.msi` option](https://github.com/terrastruct/d2/releases)^[should be Windows compatible {{< iconify icon-park-twotone:windows >}}]
2. Find Application
3. Create project folder (within {{< iconify devicon:rstudio >}})
4. Cut Application & locate within project folder
4. Use [example script with YAML specs](https://github.com/data-intuitive/quarto-d2?tab=readme-ov-file#global-options)

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="70%"}

::: {.callout-note}
Also [see Playground {{< iconify openmoji:playground-slide >}}](https://play.d2lang.com/?script=qlDQtVOoBBFRXIAAAAD__w%3D%3D&) 
:::
